sentences.sContent: At the required level of visual verisimilitude, computer animation is extremely costly.
sentences.sCn: 要使电脑动画的视觉效果达到要求的逼真程度，花费会十分昂贵。

synos.tran: 逼真，貌似真实；逼真的事物

remMethod.val: 来自verisimilar (a. 好像真实的) → 逼真的事物

trans.tranOther: Verisimilitude is the quality of seeming to be true or real
